bestellnummer.label: Bestellnummer
bestellnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

bestelldatum.label: Bestelldatum
bestelldatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

lieferant.label: Lieferant
lieferant.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

artikelnummer.label: Artikelnummer
artikelnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

artikelbezeichnung.label: Artikelbezeichnung
artikelbezeichnung.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

mengeneinheit.label: Mengeneinheit
mengeneinheit.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

erwartetes_lieferdatum.label: Erwartetes Lieferdatum
erwartetes_lieferdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

ab_artikelbezeichnung.label: Artikelbezeichnung (aus PDF)
ab_artikelbezeichnung.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

ab_mengeneinheit.label: Mengeneinheit (aus PDF)
ab_mengeneinheit.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

ab_liefertermin.label: Bestätigter Liefertermin
ab_liefertermin.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

bestellung.label: Zugehörige Bestellung
bestellung.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

pdf_dokument.label: PDF-Auftragsbestätigung
pdf_dokument.description:
An uploaded file. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a URL to download the file in the form `https://<hostname>/files/<app-id>/data/<record-id>/<control-identifier>/<internal-id>` or `null`.

extraktionsdatum.label: Extraktionsdatum
extraktionsdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

lieferant_name.label: Lieferant (aus PDF)
lieferant_name.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

auftragsnummer.label: Auftragsnummer
auftragsnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

auftragsdatum.label: Auftragsdatum
auftragsdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

ab_artikelnummer.label: Artikelnummer (aus PDF)
ab_artikelnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

bestellung.label: Bestellung
bestellung.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

auftragsbestaetigung.label: Auftragsbestätigung
auftragsbestaetigung.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

abgleichsdatum.label: Abgleichsdatum
abgleichsdatum.description:
A specific moment in time consisting of year, month, day, hour and minute. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T<HH>:<MM>` or `null`.

For example: `1879-03-14T11:30`.

abweichungstyp.label: Art der Abweichungen
abweichungstyp.description:
Arbitrary number of selected options out of multiple available ones.

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be a list of keys from this `lookup_data` attribute.

artikelnummer_bestellung.label: Artikelnummer Bestellung
artikelnummer_bestellung.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

artikelnummer_ab.label: Artikelnummer Auftragsbestätigung
artikelnummer_ab.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

abweichungsbegruendung.label: Begründung der Abweichungen
abweichungsbegruendung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

freigabestatus.label: Freigabestatus
freigabestatus.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

abgleichsergebnis.label: Abgleichsergebnis
abgleichsergebnis.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

pruefer_vorname.label: Vorname Prüfer
pruefer_vorname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

pruefer_nachname.label: Nachname Prüfer
pruefer_nachname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

pruefdatum.label: Prüfdatum
pruefdatum.description:
A specific moment in time consisting of year, month, day, hour and minute. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T<HH>:<MM>` or `null`.

For example: `1879-03-14T11:30`.

freigabeentscheidung.label: Entscheidung
freigabeentscheidung.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

kommentar.label: Kommentar zur Entscheidung
kommentar.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

korrekturmassnahmen.label: Erforderliche Korrekturmaßnahmen
korrekturmassnahmen.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

nachverfolgungsdatum.label: Nachverfolgung bis
nachverfolgungsdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.
